Job Posting: 177100 - Position: S26 IT Project Support and Analytics Co-op 177100 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 01/30/2026 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 01/13/2026 04:29 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 Address Line 2 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State PepsiCo (Canada) 700 Anderson Hill Road Pepsi-Cola North America Purchase 10577 NY JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Salary Currency Salary Salary Range $ Job Description 2026 - Summer S26 IT Project Support and Analytics Co-op 177100 Co-op Position Mississauga, ON Canada 4 months CAD 25.0 per hour for 0 Major List $25-28 per hour Job Title: PepsiCo Canada IT Project Support and Analytics Co-op - Summer 2026 Job ID: 412202 Are you hungry for an exciting and challenging opportunity in a fast-paced, diverse organization? If so, you have a future at PepsiCo. As a world class organization, we strive for excellence in everything that we do! To accomplish our goals, we need talented, innovative, creative people who know how to work hard and have fun. Taste the success with Canada's fastest growing CPG Company, and discover how our passion for growth creates big challenges and big opportunities: personally, professionally, and financially. At PepsiCo, we leverage an amazing range of technologies throughout our business; from mobile apps to advanced analytics, from cloud connected sensors to complex data integrations and everything in between. Reasons to Consider PepsiCo for your Co-op Placement: • Ongoing professional development to expand your business knowledge • Opportunities to work with a wide range of functional departments and leaders • Make an impactful change with your projects • Ability to flex work arrangements • To work with, and learn from business partners to gain key decision-making skills Opportunities for various plant tours and visits • Responsibilities This role will be split into two main focus areas: IT Project Support and Analytics IT Project Support (Primary Focus) • Support project plan development, monitoring and tracking project schedule, and tracking issues and risks. • Oversee creation and maintaining comprehensive project documentation, plans and reports • Liaise with clients to identify and define requirements, scope, and objectives • Consult with development team and vendors during development phase to provide requirements and feedback • Support the development of UAT test cases with the use of a Traceability Matrix Support project Go-Live, troubleshoot issues and help develop solutions • Analytics (Secondary Focus) Consult with Business Partners to provide key data insights using various Business Intelligence tools • What you can expect from us: • A dynamic and inclusive culture that promotes you to bring your whole-self to work • Inspiring positive change for people and the planet with sustainability goals • An opportunity to be meaningful and impactful within your work and projects A supportive team that will encourage your professional growth and development • Job Requirements Qualifications • Motivated learner enrolled in a Business, Finance, Mathematics, Engineering, or IT related program • Previous work experience as a Business Analyst or similar role preferred • Exposure to Agile methodologies • Solid communication, organizational skills, including multitasking and time-management required • Strong skills in developing presentations and reports • Strong working knowledge of Microsoft Suite (Outlook, Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and Knowledge of SQL required • Experience in Analytics from conception to delivery an asset • Working experience with dashboarding (e.g., Business Objects, Power BI) is an asset. Self-motivated, enthusiastic, and able to build collaborative relationships! • PepsiCo may use Artificial Intelligence as part of its hiring process. Specifically, we may use AI-based tools to screen, assess, or select applicants. This posting is for an existing vacancy. Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Optional Special Application Instructions Application Link: https://www.pepsicojobs.com/internshipsprograms/jobs/412202?lang=en-us&previousLocale=en-US Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
